reviews.text: The best grill octopus in town.
Ordered a delivery but the food was really good.  ty
Great for Take out Wish the big screen tv had the Yankees winning but it wasn‚Äôt the Pizza which was super great

My friends and I celebrated a 25th birthday at Patrizia‚Äôs and had the most amazing time! The waitstaff were so extremely wonderful and the food was so delicious! Highly recommended the papardelle alla boleness and espresso martinis. Will most definitely be back again this place is awesome!
I love this place üòç‚Ä¶
I like the food, the place, and the people I definitely will come back!
Great food. Quiet at 4:30pm
Very Nice Italian restaurant in nyc, first class cuisine. Excellent service  and wine selection .
Not a fun of the butternut squash ravioli. The focaccia was amazing! And very friendly stuff!
Quick and reasonable price! The food was Delicious and everyone was so nice!
perfect weather for an outdoor lunch! service is great. dipping oil and bread are scrumptious.
Ive only ever had the pizza but its fantastic - easily one of the best, if not the best, in the neighborhood. Staff has always been friendly, never disappoints

Went to dinner with my bestfriend on Friday night, it was my first time at the place and it was her first time in this location. The food was amazing! The drinks were delicious and the vibes were so fun. Music is a mix of everything and overall so much fun. Our server/ bartender who is also the manager was wonderful. He was polite, funny and attentive to us, he even complimented our drink! We can not to go back to Patrizia's ü•∞
Good food and drinks.  Moderate prices.  Great lunch specials from 11 3.
Great food with some interesting choices. Attentive and kind wait staff.
Good food, good music, great vibes!
Second time celebrating my birthday here and i loved it! Amazing food, service and great vibes! Had a party of 16 and was easily accommodated. Definitely come here!
Un ristorante italiano dove si mangia di qualit√†. Pizza veramente buona e ottima bistecca.

After a day out in Manhattan we decided to try this restaurant out. I had seen this restaurant on YouTube before and they are known for their Star shaped pizza.

We decided to try it out for lunch and I'm glad we did.  We ordered the fried anchovies, pizza egg rolls, carbonara pasta, and a margarita star shaped pizza.

The appetizers were spot on! It's not the salty anchovies that have been fermented, but Fresh anchovies! The egg rolls were actually really good and it made sense.

The Carbonara was solid, but the Star -shaped pizza was amazing.  I imagine that all the pizza is really good there. I say this because the crust was crispy and fluffy at the same time.  The star pieces were also stuffed with cheese!  In terms of pizza, one of the best slices I've had in a while.

I would recommend this place for any visitor or tourist.  The pizza itself is worth it.

Enjoyed dinner here in their outdoor sidewalk seating which is nice and spacious. Went on Sunday evening with a small group. We ordered a few pasta dishes, a pizza, two different chicken dishes and some drinks. Food was tasty and the service was attentive. The atmosphere could benefit from an awning over the space as there were some birds flying around, but overall a good experience and would return.
I've been to All the Brooklyn and Queens locations if the one in NYC is the Same as the other patriZias i highly Recommend it lots of Food and Fun, your friends and family will love ‚ù§Ô∏èit

Excellent service great food! The sauce was perfection on the pizza n wine was delicious !! You have to visit the lady in front n the waiters n superb n owner is kind too! Go hurry you won‚Äôt be sorry you did it!!!

Came for a birthday and I‚Äôd say well worth it. Other than DJ Can‚Äôt Pick a Genre, atmosphere was immaculate. Fun fact not everyone can be a DJ and it showed. Food and drinks well worth the al a cart or group rate. If they can find a better DJ, easily worth $10 on top on the original price.

My go to place whenever I‚Äôm in the city! Everything from the service , to the food and ambiance is perfect. Great for date night during the week and a little livelier on the weekends. And me and my pup are loving the new outdoor patio !
The desserts are absolutely unforgettable
If you wanna have fun and celebrate special occasion with your friends or family This is the place. Music, service and amazing food!! Pasta üçù and  wine. I love it. üòç

Was not impressed by this location at ALL. I've visited the Long Island locations many times and they never disappointed. This one?

1. Salad had old wilted pieces in it.
2. Pasta was SO undercooked. I had to throw away half of it because it was so hard and the pieces were all stuck together. Like they just left it in the boiling water without stirring it once. and no they were not busy at ALL so what was the excuse. The place was in fact pretty empty.
3. They were missing so many things from the menu (steak, veal, tartufo). And we wanted alot of these things so that was disappointing.

The place looked like some open cafeteria style lunch room. Didn't feel classy or date night worthy whatsoever. Not to mention my stomach felt uneasy after this meal- After the salad I already had my concerns about how clean things really are in the kitchen.

Will not be returning to this location at all. Very disappointing birthday dinner. Only good thing I can say was the waiter was very nice and did his job.
Best place i‚Äôve ever been too
The dishes are flavorful, and The portions are generous. The atmosphere is casual and the help really try to please
Literally the best service and food and drinks
The best
Hella good, rly nice waiter.
Great pizza! The pizza base is high-gluten and chewy which is my preference
AMAZING
Immaculate vibes.
SO GOOOOOOODDDDDD
so fabulous
Amazing arugula salad! Go to place!
Exelente

Felt like I was back in Italy!
The food was amazing super authentic and full of flavor. Everything tasted homemade in the best way. Service was friendly and on point. Just a really great vibe overall. If you love Italian food, this place is a must.
i really liked it here! i am gluten free and my server Jose was very knowledgeable and kind! the food was delectable and the vibes were good
Went with group. Everyone pleased with choices- large menu
It's a hidden gem in the heart of Manhattan ‚Äî truly authentic and full of character. Garlic bread was Aaaamazing!
Delicious Pizza
Attended a 70th birthday celebration.  Great food. Waiters very attentive. Nice place.

The best of the best! 10/10 service across the board. Thank you to all of Patrizia‚Äôs staff for always taking such good care of my family and me during all of our family gatherings, birthdays, and now baby showers!!

Our happiest memories are at Patrizia‚Äôs, full of family, laughter, great drinks, and delicious food!

We recently hosted my nephew‚Äôs baby shower at Patrizia‚Äôs of Manhattan, and I truly can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about the entire experience. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with warmth and professionalism. The staff was attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure every detail was perfect.

The food‚Äîwow! Every dish was absolutely delicious, from the appetizers to the main courses and desserts. Guests are still raving about the pasta, the fresh ingredients, and the generous portions. Patrizia‚Äôs really knows how to treat your taste buds.

The d√©cor was beautiful and created the perfect atmosphere for celebrating such a special occasion. Everything was so thoughtfully arranged, creating a warm, inviting space that felt both elegant and festive.

Thank you to everyone at Patrizia‚Äôs for making this day unforgettable. It was everything we hoped for and more. We‚Äôll definitely be back for future celebrations!

Always a great time and such great food!!  All the staff provide great service and ensure you have a good experience. Love the shrimp parm, eggplant, pizzas and calamari! Oh and the breaaaaad mmm! Highly recommended for large parties, but also a nice date night out.
10/10 experience, will be going back soon!
Great food amazing service can‚Äôt wait to go back.
ÌîºÏûê Î≥¥Îã§. Ïù¥ Î©¥ Ïù¥ Îçî ÎßõÏûàÏñ¥Ïöî.

Had an absolutely amazing time at Patrizia‚Äôs! Gennaro and his staff went above and beyond to make our experience unforgettable. The energy in the restaurant was incredible‚Äîlively, fun, and perfect for a night out with friends. The food was outstanding, from the pizza to the pasta and mouthwatering desserts. Everything was fresh, flavorful, and served family-style, making it even more enjoyable. The service was top-notch. Can‚Äôt wait to come back‚Äîhighly recommend! üçùüç∑üéâ

I had the most incredible holiday party at Patrizia‚Äôs of Manhattan! We were a group of 30+ people, and the entire experience was absolutely flawless. The staff was attentive, accommodating, and made sure every detail was perfect. The food was beyond delicious‚Äîauthentic Italian dishes served family-style, with generous portions.

The atmosphere was festive and welcoming, making it the perfect setting for our celebration. Everyone in our group left raving about the food, the ambiance, and especially the service. Patrizia‚Äôs truly knows how to make an event special, and I couldn‚Äôt recommend them more for any gathering. This was a holiday party to remember‚Äîthank you, Patrizia‚Äôs!

My first time being here and it was a wonderful experience. My wife and I each had a different pasta served with a complementary salad. It was so filling and satisfying, and the quantity was more than enough that we had leftovers for dinner. We would definitely recommend this restaurant if you're in the neighborhood.

The Calamari toscano was excellent! I asked for a ketchup incase they served it dry but it came in a delicious red pepper sauce.
The bread was a treat! Highly recommend this place

Came here on a whim and it was absolutely worth it. The service is great, several members of staff were helpful and polite. The food came quick and tasted fantastic, seasoned perfectly and the sauce coated the pasta beautifully. Came with free bread and salads. Highly recommend.

Standard fare Italian American restaurant. The pizza was decent, the dough was a bit on the chewy side but overall acceptable. Fast service and pleasant waiter. It is a bit overpriced for what it is but is relatively famous. Has the space‚Ä¶

If you're looking for authentic Italian food with an American twist, you're in the right place.  The focaccia basket with garlic dipping oil is worth  the trip all by itself! The avocado salad with walnuts was huge.  Definitely enough for 2 people, and probably four as a side salad.  The eggplant parmesan was absolutely perfect.  Cheesy, thinly breaded slices of eggplant and homemade sauce.  Cute tables outside and a casual vibe inside. It got pretty loud at lunch,  the acoustics aren't great,  but other than that.  I would definitely recommend.

I just ordered delivery of one 6 slice pie. It was $20, with delivery and tax $27. This small box arrives. See for yourself. I‚Äôm stupefied as to how small this is. I am 5‚Äô tall and have very small hands. THE SLICE IS ABOUT THE SIZE OF MY HAND. The pizza is very tasty. Order from somewhere else if you are hungry. I just ate half a pie. This is ridiculous.

From the moment we walked in, we knew this restaurant was going to be a hit! The servers, cooks and all the staff  consistently provided friendly service and excellent attention to our meal and drinks! The service alone warrants a 5 star.‚Ä¶

Perfect, except for one thing. Never a disappointment, as expected. Beautiful decor, professional and efficient staff and nothing but the best food! You can never go wrong with their family style. They have outdoor seating and a very‚Ä¶
Great spot for doing a large birthday dinner in the city. Unlimited drinks and so much good food! The staff was very accommodating for our party as well.

This place is perfect to bring your family for their family style packages. The portions are perfect and everyone will be full definitely something to satisfy everyone.
The food is sooooo good genuine Italian feast with all the fixings. The drinks are delish too you have to try the cappuccino martini it‚Äôs super smooth
Our waitesss was soo friendly and had us laughing all night and there‚Äôs a super cute neon sign and second level for extra space

We love Patrizias! We have been to almost every location. The fried calamari appetizer is AMAZING! Food was fresh and delicious. Very impressed. Parking was very convenient. Large space plenty of seating.

This place is pure magic with homemade pasta and drinks that are innovative and tasty, as well as strong! The penne vodka is a must order and so is any of the star shaped pizza we got ours top with prosciutto!

The veal Parm with Fire and smothered in cheese I also requested our pasta to come in a bread bowl! This place is absolutely fantastic ‚Ä¶ We will be back

This is a very loud place! Went here for a friend‚Äôs birthday dinner and the music was blasting throughout. It makes it hard to enjoy the food and great service. But if loud music is not a problem, delicious food!

Best way to spend Christmas Eve. I felt like we were with family!  The staff was above and beyond caring, attentive and full of life. You have to try the fixed price all you can eat!  Be prepared for one of the best food experiences of your‚Ä¶

I like this place. Went for lunch. Prices were reasonable. Bread was good. Portions were big, even with a side salad. Service was great. Wasnt too crowded or loud. Food tasted good. Didnt take long to come out. I had bolognese pasta but it destroyed my stomach afterwards. Not sure why maybe because i dont eat saucey pasta and cheese a lot. I know this is a group place and nighttime or weekends can get crowded and loud. I seen it packed with people celebrating birthdays. Never been at night but maybe ill check it out and try the entrees and pizza. They got alcohol too.

My pasta had no flavor, and no sauce maybe like a speck. I asked for penne alla vodka with chicken she asked grilled or fried I said fried. They didn‚Äôt give me any chicken I had to take some from my moms food . They gave me a small salad I don‚Äôt ask for . I wanted to go back but I walked so far back home I was very disappointed and upset.

We came here for the brunch special and were pleasantly surprised.  The brunch is served family style and you pick one item from the pancake menu, one from the eggs menu and one from the pizza menu.  We picked the Dutch pancake,  eggs Parmigiano, and the pizza with eggs and bacon.  The only down side was the included drinks.  They were bad.  Next time we will just get a bottle of wine.

Siamo venuti a cena qui perch√© volevamo provare a mangiare la pasta o la pizza e devo dire che siamo stati sorpresi. Gli gnocchi alla sorrentina sono buonissimi e anche la pizza √à come quella che si mangia in Italia, ottimi ingredienti . Il personale gentile e disponibile. Alcuni di loro di origine italiana.

Pizza oven was out so we each tried another plate on the menu. Service was quick, an abundance of delicious bread was served and each dish was fresh. However, the dishes did not taste anything out of this world.
The food was so delicious. Garlic infused flavors! Got all you can eat and come with drinks, appetizer, entree, dessert. I can‚Äôt express how delicious this was.

What a delightful restaurant to participate in evening shenanigans! Shenanigans entail: singing and waving our napkins around in joy to the amazing music with other patrons, our choices of alcoholic beverages, alongside the great foods we had! Our family of 15 came over to the restaurant in celebration of a 50th birthday to my wonderful eldest brother. We participated in the Famous Family Style Dinner, and boy, were we STUFFED. The food was fresh, and we could taste it was made with love. It seemed as if the pasta sauce was homemade, I am unsure! My personal favorite dishes that we chosen from the prix menu were the burratas and chicken scarpariello *if that was the one with peppers* the smoke was good. The staff was very attentive to our table, despite other parties of 15, and 5 birthday parties. A great place for groups with amazing music. I don't normally eat dairy nor meat, but this was a nice choice for those types of diets.

Delicious pizza! I love their dough, which is crispy outside and chewy inside. Service was good too.
The only downside is the location. You need to walk minimum 10 minutes from the nearest subway station. But it's worth it, so I'll definitely come back!
The food was SO good, definitely recommend this place, I loved the fact that they play Italian music. Francisco our server was attentive and helpful.

I'm so glad I reserved a table for this place bc it's really good and there are lots of people waiting to eat. It's delicious and authentic, I had the most basic, Americanized dish but I don't regret a single bite. Portions are HUGE.‚Ä¶

Have yet to visit in person but I enjoy delivery from here often. The carbonara is one of my favorites and the star shape adds the extra something to the already delicious diavolo pizza. Can't go wrong with the cannolis either!
Amazing food! Some of the best pasta I have ever had. Very attentive service, food came fast. Would 100% come back! Highly recommend.

Very tasty pizza is available here, the home delivery service is also available at this place.. You can also book the table on the google maps and enjoy your party with all your family and friends.. You will feel the real taste of Italian Pizza when you will take a bite of it ... So, come and have fun with your buddies...üëçüëç‚Ä¶
a great place for a banquet or just lunch or dinner. The family menu is simply excellent. I recommend everyone to visit

Ordered pickup and getting the food was fine, but the food quality was very bad. I ordered what looked like a margarita calzone. When I cut into it, I found the bread filled with nothing but half-melted, unappetizing cheese (see the picture). I looked through the remainder and the only other ingredients I found were 3-5 slivers of basil. Will not order from here again.

This place has everything you want in a true Italian restaurant from the decor to the service to the food, it‚Äôs all authentic. The food was fresh and soooo good, portions are large too. I really enjoyed the calamari, mozzarella sticks and veal parmigiana and can still taste the food days later. Highly recommend this spot.
